bioghist.p: Alfred Comolli was president of Hydrocarbon Technologies, now a subsidiary of Headwaters, Inc. Hydrocarbon Technologies (originally known as Hydrocarbon Research) was founded by Percival Keith, who was a pioneer in the development of petroleum refining processes. Keith did original work on synthetic fuels and the use of hydrogen for improvement of petroleum derivatives and reduction of ores to metals.

scopecontent.p: This collection includes three binders: two concern the work done by Hydrocarbon Research on the hydrocol process to convert natural gas to gasoline; the other one contains a report for American Cyanamid on whether they should venture into synthetic fibers with the production of Fiber X-51.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
